text: This is a list of episodes from the eighth season of Alice. ==Episodes== ==Broadcast history== Alice began the season airing Sunday nights at 8:00-8:30 pm (EST) from October 6 to October 2, 1983,TV Listings for October 2, 1983 before being moved to the 9:30-10:00 pm (EST) time slot on February 12, 1984,TV Listings for February 12, 1984 where it remained for the remainder of the TV season.TV Listings for May 20, 1984 ==References== Category:1983 American television seasons Category:1984 American television seasons
title: Alice (season 8)
